name: Endless Engines
description:
Endless Engines is an endless roguelike dungeon crawler where you play as Cole the bandit aboard the Endless Engine, a never-ending train that travels through time and space. Select from either campaign or endless mode, and board the Endless Engine. Fight your way through a variety of rooms against enemies of all shapes and sizes, and discover the weapons the Endless Engines holds. Uncover the dangerous foes that call the engine home.
The Endless Engine: The seemingly never ending Endless Engine is made up of a plethora of different cars with different obstacles and creatures inhabiting them. Use the obstacles within each car to your advantage to protect yourself from the creatures lurking within. Collect tickets from defeated foes and spend them on weapons and items from the various shops located all throughout the train.

The Workers: The Endless Engine is run by an unknown leader who is determined keep the train running forever and protect the treasures within. The leader has enlisted the help of many different creatures both sentient and feral to help protect his train. These creatures ranging from staff members hired by the leader to feral animals and insects to even mindless slimes. Cole will have to use all that is available to him if he hopes to overcome everything that stands in his way.

Weapons: While Cole may be a talented thief he does not possess the raw physical strength it would take to overcome his foes. Luckily the train is filled with various weapons, both conventional and unconventional, that should give Cole to power he needs to survive. Even regular every day objects like toasters and keychains have been warped by the train residual magic and can be used as lethal weaponry or to boost several of Cole's physical attributes.
